author: Jake Burger
description: Rye based (originally Jim Beam) perfectly served with dry vermouth and Antica Formula
name: Portobello Star Manhattan (Perfect)
recipeIngredient: 60 ml Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)
15 ml Antica Formula or other well aged sweet vermouth

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass
